mapper.select: SELECT c.userId, c.product_id, c.cart_quantity, p.p_name, p.p_thumbnail, p.p_price, o.opt_name FROM cart c INNER JOIN product p ON c.product_id = p.product_id AND c.userId = #{param1} AND p.product_id = #{param2} LEFT JOIN p_option o ON o.product_id = p.product_id -- 이 부분은 옵션 테이블과 연결합니다
select product_id from product where userId = #{param1}

select p.p_name,p.p_thumbnail,oi.o_price,oi.o_quantity,oi.order_id,o.orderdate,o.d_status,oi.product_id,o.d_status from c_order o, c_orderitem oi, product p where o.order_id = oi.ORDER_ID and oi.PRODUCT_ID = p.product_id and o.userId = #{param1}

select p.p_name,p.p_thumbnail,oi.o_price,oi.o_quantity,oi.order_id,o.orderdate,o.d_status,oi.product_id,o.addressee,o.phone,o.address,o.ordermemo from c_order o, c_orderitem oi, product p where o.order_id = oi.ORDER_ID and oi.PRODUCT_ID = p.product_id and o.order_id = #{param1}
mapper.update: update c_order set d_status = '주문취소' where order_id = #{param1}
